name: .8CI
summary: Learn about .8CI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use Texas Instruments TI Connect CE (Windows, Mac) to transfer an 8CI file to a TI-84 Plus C graphing calculator. You can then use the file as a graph overlay.

You can use MCJack123's 8CI to PNG Converter (multiplatform) to convert 8CI files to .PNG images. Note that using the converter requires additional prerequisite libraries and knowledge of how to compile .CPP files.
